ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] EQ Screen freeze
ygData.msgSnippet: It s a random problem.  When heng heng nothing happened when play the whole day.  When sui sui can have up to 5 times a night.  And the WORST is of coz u have
ygData.messageBody:
It's a random problem. When heng heng nothing happened when play the whole
day. When sui sui can have up to 5 times a night. And the WORST is of coz
u have it when u r kiting on top of the TD sea....;((

On 03 January, 2001 6:00 PM, Dexter [SMTP:dexterw@...] wrote:
> Had this problem before. Didnt do anything to it but these few days didnt
> kana it hope it stays that way. Sometimes my PC just suddenly reset
itself
> while Im playing Eq...
>
> At 11:37 AM 1/3/01 +0800, you wrote:
> >Since the sov patch, my EQ screen can freeze unpectedly all of a sudden.
> > This is not the normal LD, where I will get the disconnected msg and
get
> >kicked back to the EQ login screen. Instead, the PC just freeze and I
have
> >to reboot the PC (ie auto scandisk etc) and restart EQ. Sometime the PC
> >automatically restart by itself just b4 I get to Win98 desktop.
> >
> >Some other SCV cable modem users are also facing the same problem (eg
> >Merns, Trifrost) while some didn't (eg Leshrec). This problem can
occurs
> >several times a night, or none at all. On average I will have 2-3
> >occurance every night. Surprisingly sometime I got no freezing on
> >weekends, when the server is very crowded.
> >
> >I think this is related to some configurations (eg DataRate file) as
well
> >as SCV modem. I just wanna check with those EQ SCV users, what is your
> >datarate setting (5.0 to 9.0)? Anyone else got the same problem? If
yes,
> >did you manage to solve this, thx!
> >
> >Ziltus (AdV), Innoruuk.
> >
> >Singapore Everquest Players List
> >
> >
> SPECIAL: Go to http://home.pacific.net.sg/~dexterwong/friends.html and
send
> it to your friends. You'll be suprised how many true friends you have!
